charges.charge_description: Title 42, U.S.C. Section 7413(c)(1)- The knowing failure to thoroughly inspect a facility prior to renovation Title 42, U.S.C. Section 7413(c)(1)- The knowing failure to provide written notice to the EPA and its designee at least 10 working days prior to commencing a renovation activity Title 42, U.S.C. Section 7413(c)(1)- The knowing failure to adequately wet regulated asbestos-containing material while a jurisdicitional amount was being removed during a renovation activity
